name: Kevin Donaldson
text: Ordered a large pizza which despite being a large the sizing was extremely small. The pizza itself was not tasty and there are many other places that do pizza way better. Wings were okay and mozzarella sticks were prob the best out of the …More

name: Irene Equestrian
text: Have ordered 3 times now Pizza was good also ordered a gyro was one of the best I found around here. Would highly recommend! Wings were also delicious GOOD LUCK  PIZZA BOLI

name: Shay Love
text: Terrible .. If it had a no star option id kindly put that . I ordered a large pizza and it was terribly small .and nasty . ordered cinnaboli sticks and it was stuck to the paper . Very nasty . A rushed job . No sauce or dipping for anything …More

name: Rick Purvis
text: Delivery took over 90 minutes and they brought a "gyro" in a burrito wrapper and oven fries. Staff was polite, but didn't know the menu, what some of the items on the menu were or what specials their flyer advertised. Couldn't recommend at all.

name: Rosie Graham
text: This is the 2nd time that I've ordered from here. The first time I ordered a XL pizza and it took an hour and 45 minute to be delivered. The 2nd time I ordered a XL pizza and bread sticks which took an hour and 20 minutes to be delivered and the pizza was ice cold. I would not recommend this pizza place to anyone.

name: Nicolas Brocklehurst
text: I love pizza Bolis. Their wings are delicious, big, and Juicy. Ever get their talapia??? Try it. What about their burger at just the right price??? Okay their pizza isn't my type of pizza but neither is seasons pizza. Different pizza for …More

name: Mohiuddin Shaown
text: The delivery was on time and. Puzza was was awesome !!! U guys should try their chese stake pizza.

name: Md Alam
text: I love there pizza , wing and sub....pizza bolias  have  best pizza , wing and sub

name: Edward Martz
text: Very good pizza. Fierce competition in the area though.

name: Daniel Powell
text: There's a sign on the door that says "store closed"

name: Erik Berry
text: The worst pizza I have ever had the guy was nice but I don't know why they came to magnolia i would rather eat anywhere else then pizza bolis again

name: Adnan Akram
text: Love the wing and awesome pizza!!!
